articles.title: North Wilkesboro pit lane shows how far crew safety has come - ESPN - ESPN
articles.description: As NASCAR returns to North Wilkesboro, veteran crew members recall its narrow pit lane, a track nearly as dangerous for them as it was for the drivers.
articles.content:
North Wilkesboro Speedway's narrow pit lane became the stuff of legend in NASCAR. ISC Images & Archives via Getty Images
"What the hell ...?"
